pages.text: $(li)You can craft a physical copy of the Endernomicon.$(br)$(li)This has new features that will help you in your journey.
$(li)While you are holding the Endernomicon in your hand you can shift right click a block to access to its entry.
$(li)While you are holding the Endernomicon in your hotbar you can place your mouse on any block and press Ctrl key to access to its entry.
$(li)This feature also can be used on JEI Items or in any kind of inventory, such as a Chest or a Furnace.
